      This method calculates the displacement of the ship with respect to direction and acceleration of the ship.

      This method will bring the dx and dy values closer to zero based on the ship's spaceBreak value.

      This method will check if the ship is able to fire, and if so will create a missile and add it to the missile array.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpaceShip

        public SpaceShip(int faceNumber,
         int x,
         int y)
        This is the main constructor for a players ship. This one will create the keydown class along with some other player used variables.
        Parameters:
        faceNumber - - used to select image from Board.iiarray
        x - - location of the x coor
        y - - location of the y coor

      • SpaceShip

        public SpaceShip(int face,
         java.lang.String name,
         double x,
         double y,
         int dir)
        more basic constructor used for non-player ships. This is used for the playerHashTable of other ships.
        Parameters:
        face - - image from ImageIconArray
        name - - name of the player using the ship
        x - - location of the ship's x
        y - - location of the ship's y
        dir - - direction of the ship

      • SpaceShip

        public SpaceShip()
        This method changes the x, y, and direction of the ship.
        Parameters:
        x - a new value of x for the ship
        y - a new value of y for the ship
        direction - the new direction for the ship

      • computeTurnDirection

        public void computeTurnDirection()
        This method finds the direction the ship needs to point at the mouse location and executes a turn based on the ships turnSpeed. The ship will find the fastest way to get to the direction and will turn to the location.

      • Accelerate

        public void Accelerate(double deltaDirection,
              double percentage)
        This method calculates the displacement of the ship with respect to direction and acceleration of the ship. The new displacement will be added to the ships displacement
        Parameters:
        direction - - This is the direction of the acceleration
        percentage - - This is the percentage of the ship's acceleration that will be used

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()

      • Move

        public void Move()
        The Move() method is called once the Accelerate() method is finished. This method will change the X and Y by the dx and dy found in Accelerate().

        If dx and dy are not zero the variable changed will be set to true This will be used when sending data to the SpaceServer.

      • MoveMissile

        public void MoveMissile()
        This method will update the middle of the ship and move the ship's missiles by calling missiles move method.

      • applySpaceBreak

        public void applySpaceBreak()
        This method will bring the dx and dy values closer to zero based on the ship's spaceBreak value.

      • cycle

        public void cycle()
        This method will changed the ship based on what keydown event is active. Based on what keydown is active, it will have a different affect on the ship. This method will call the regenerateStats method, and finally the move method.
        Specified by:
        cycle in class Drawable

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d,
         double dx,
         double dy)
        The paint method will paint the ship along with what the ship contains. This will paint the ship's missiles before painting the ship itself.
        Overrides:
        paint in class Drawable

      • regenerateStats

        public void regenerateStats()
        This method will regenerate the shields and energy of the ship. Some of the values will not regen right away.

      • checkFire

        public void checkFire()
        This method will check if the ship is able to fire, and if so will create a missile and add it to the missile array.

      • resetChange

        public void resetChange()
        This method will return changed to false

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        this method converts the ship's information into a usable string for the communication with the server
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • isFiring

        public boolean isFiring()
        Deprecated. 
        This method was used to track when other players fired. This should no longer be used
        Returns:

      • fire

        public void fire(double dx,
        double dy,
        int direction,
        java.lang.String missileID)
        This method creates a missiles in weapon list based on the dx and dy of the ship fired. The missile is given an unique id for the missile
        Parameters:
        dx - - starting dx of the missile
        dy - - starting dy of the missile
        direction - - starting direction of the missile
        missileID - - unique id of the missile

      • getMouseLocation

        public java.awt.Point getMouseLocation()
        Returns:
        the mouseLocation

      • checkIfWeaponHit

        public void checkIfWeaponHit(SpaceShip otherPlayer)
        This method checks other players missiles to see if the player ship was hit by any of them. If the ship is hit by the missile damage is applied. Once a missile hits a ship, the server is informed that the missile should no longer exists and should be removed. The server then spreads this information to other ships
        Parameters:
        otherPlayer - - all other players on the server, PlayerHastTable.values()

      • damageShip

        private void damageShip(double damage)
        This takes away shields if the ship has some, otherwise takes health away from the ship. If the ship drops below 1 health, the ship's status is changed to "dead"
        Parameters:
        damage - - damage inflicted on the ship

      • setShipStatus

        public void setShipStatus(java.lang.String status)
